name: The Hidden Mountain
description:
Explore a mountain full of mystery! See what sort of secrets there are and find the trophy you came to the mountain for!

Made in 7 days for the Community Game Jam - Theme is the Game is a Liar. (What sort of things am I hiding?)

Also, my first ever *finished/released* game! It was exciting and enjoyable the whole way through.

September 16-17th is when the game will get the revised and hopefully WebGL versions.
